body_html:
I encountered a similar issue:
I am using nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel-ubuntu16.04 docker image.

While trying to upgrade tensorflow from 0.12.1 to 1.1.0 , I get this error:
ImportError: libcuda.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

body:
I encountered a similar issue:
I am using nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel-ubuntu16.04 docker image.

While trying to upgrade tensorflow from 0.12.1 to 1.1.0 , I get this error:
ImportError: libcuda.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
